title: Cities Skylines II Challenge | Ways to Play
description: This video is brought to you by Paradox Interactive. Cities: Skylines II is available now on PC via Steam, the Microsoft Store and PC Game Pass. It's easier than ever to take your town from Tiny Village to Thriving Metropolis in the most realistic city builder ever: Cities Skylines: II. That is, if you're playing without the added challenge of say, having to get creative with the new and improved Road Builder? 'Honest Game Trailers' head writer, Bailey Meyers, and GameSpot Senior Video Producer, Dave Klein

title: Five Nights at Freddy's Is Projected To Make A Lot Of Money At The Box Office
description:
Universal/Blumhouse's Five Nights at Freedy's is projected to make over $50 million at the box office despite the film coming to Peacock on the same date.

According to Deadline, Five Nights will have the second-best opening this Fall, putting it right behind Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour, which earned $92.8 M at the box office. What makes this stand out even more is that releasing a film before Halloween traditionally doesn't make a lot of money. Before this, the biggest openings were 2011's Puss in Boots, earning $34 million, and 2006's Saw III, earning $36 million.

It's also worth mentioning that the film's production cost $20 million, and it's projected that the film has already made at least $11 million in presales. Even though the numbers look good for Freddy, it'll be viewable on Peacock for those with a paid subscription. The Deadline report mention

title: Save $20 On 8BitDo's Stellar Xbox Controller Charging Dock
description:
Struggling to keep your Xbox controllers charged between gaming sessions? Then adding a charging dock to your game room is a smart investment--and now that the 8BitDo Dual Charging Dock is on sale for just $25, you can snag one of the best chargers at its lowest price ever.

8BitDo Dual Charging Dock for Xbox Wireless Controllers

title: Dozens Of Horror Board Games Get Scary Good Price Cuts Ahead Of Halloween
description:
Halloween is almost here, but there's still time to grab a few last items before the spookiest holiday of the year arrives at your front door. And if you're throwing a Halloween party or looking for a way to kill time with family and friends, you'll want to swing by Amazon and check out its massive catalog of discounted horror board games. Everything from Bloodborne: The Board Game to Zombicide: Black Plague is on sale--making this the perfect time to fill your shelves with spooky-good games.

One of the best horror board games available at a discount ahead of Halloween is for Mansions of Madness, which is just $90 (

title: World of Warcraft Classic Hardcore 2,961,039 Permadeaths
description: WoW Classic Hardcore went live on August 24th, and since then Death has permanently claimed almost 3 MILLION characters! Watch to find out how many deaths the each of the top 10 deadliest things in Azeroth are responsible for.

title: Get 34 Horror Comics Including Night Of The Living Dead For $13
description:
Fanatical's new Halloween Horror Comics Bundle includes up to 34 horror-themed digital comics that make perfect spooky season reading material. GameSpot readers can save 10% on their bundle with promo code GAMESPOT10.

See at Fanatical

The bundle starts at just $1 for five comics including the first issues of Fright Night, American Monsters Vol. 1, Eternal Thirst of Dracula Book 1, Hatchet Halloween, and Beware the Witch's Shadow.

Pay at least $7 to get all of the previous comics, plus the first issue of the Night of the Living Dead co

title: Gravity Is The Deadliest Enemy Of All When You Only Have One Life In WoW
description:
Forget deadly monsters or even other players; the ground is World of Warcraft Classic Hardcore's most dangerous foe.

Blizzard in a new video has revealed the latest stats for WoW Classic's permadeath servers, where players only get one life. Nearly 3 million players have died so far, amounting to about one death every one and a half seconds since servers went live in late August. But it's the list of the deadliest things in Azeroth's that is really putting into perspective just how dangerous the journey to level 60 can be.

As revealed in Blizzard's stats breakdown video, even low-level enemies can become terrifying when one life is all a player has. The NPCs that have claimed the most lives are almost all found within the game's lower level zones, wi

title: Mortal Kombat 1 Patch Notes Show Some Very Welcome Changes
description:
NetherRealm Studios has released another update for its fighting game Mortal Kombat 1. Even though the official patch notes are not out yet, some of its player base have already discovered what makes this update stand out.

Thanks to a series of tweets by user @Mitsuownes (via IGN), we now know some changes the 0.134 update makes. For instance, players can tag moves again, making it a lot easier to learn specific inputs, and they will no longer have to worry about people spamming Cyrax's horizontal kopter chopper because it'll cost a full bar whenever it's used now.

#MK1 Patch Changes Thread:
1/? Mileena's 12 doesn't

title: Among Us The Fungle Launch Trailer
description: Among Us has a new map Fungle, which is now out to try out! The Crewmates might be in trouble crash landing on a deserted island filled with mushrooms, marshmallows, and... weird plants?

title: Harry Potter's Daniel Radcliffe Produced Doc About His Stunt Double Who Was Paralyzed On Set Of Deathly Hallows
description:
Harry Potter actor Daniel Radcliffe will be an executive producer on an upcoming documentary about his stunt double who was paralyzed after a filming accident on The Deathly Hallows.

Radcliffe will also appear in the film, David Holmes: The Boy Who Lived, speaking to the documentary crew about his friend and stunt double.

Continue Reading at GameSpot</

title: Fanta Fright Factor
description: Ready to face the ultimate fear test? We're challenging 4 influencers with the Fanta Fright Factor to see who keeps their cool during these horror classics.

title: Crunchyroll Is Now Available Through Amazon Prime Video
description:
Amazon Prime members can now add the anime streaming service Crunchyroll to their Prime Video subscription.

The Crunchyroll Prime Video add-on channel starts at $8/month for the entry-level Fan plan. There's also a $10/month Mega Fan option that lets you download videos for offline watching. Both membership levels include a seven-day free trial, so you can try the channel out before adding it to your Amazon Prime subscription. You can even use the free trial to check out recent fan-favorite series like Chainsaw Man, Spy x Family, or Dragon Ball Super, along with hundreds of other shows and movies.

Add Crunchyro

title: Alan Wake Full Story Recap
description: After 13 years, one quasi-sequel, and one DLC tie-in, Remedy is finally returning to its well of inky darkness and releasing the sequel, Alan Wake 2. Here's everything that's happened in the Alan Wake story so far.

title: COD No Russian Designer Originally Thought Fellow Developers Were Overreacting
description:
2009's Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II is remembered for, among other things, its controversial "No Russian" mission in which players walk alongside a terrorist and can murder innocent civilians in an airport. Designer Mohammad Alavi spoke to IGN about this mission, saying some people inside developer Infinity Ward objected to it and said it was offensive. Additionally, Alavi discussed how a military veteran was brought in to test the mission and he ended up putting the controller down and walking out.

"There were definitely some people at our company that [objected to No Russian]," Alavi said. "I thought they were overreacting, but they were 100% right. I remember one person was like, 'This is offensive. I don't want to play this level.'"

Infinity Ward co-founder Jason West ma

title: COD No Russian Designer Originally Thought People Were Overreacting To The Controversry
description:
2009's Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II is remembered for, among other things, its controversial "No Russian" mission in which players walk alongside a terrorist and can murder innocent civilians in an airport. Designer Mohammad Alavi spoke to IGN about this mission, saying some people inside developer Infinity Ward objected to it and said it was offensive. Additionally, Alavi discussed how a military veteran was brought in to test the mission and he ended up putting the controller down and walking out.

"There were definitely some people at our company that [objected to No Russian]," Alavi said. "I thought they were overreacting, but they were 100% right. I remember one person was like, 'This is offensive. I don't want to play this level.'"

Infinity Ward co-founder Jason West ma

title: Starfield Is Bethesda's First Game In Space, But It Almost Wasn't
description:
Long before Starfield, Bethesda actually worked on a doomed-to-fail space sim that never saw the light of day called 10th Planet, a game that would have seen players battling aliens in F-16 fighter jets retrofitted for space combat.

That's all according to Bethesda Softworks veteran Bruce Nesmith in a new interview with MinnMax. Nesmith originally joined Bethesda in 1995, only to later be fired after his work on 10th Planet and rehired by the company years later. He eventually served as the lead designer on The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and as a senior systems designer for Starfield. Nesmith retired from Bethesda shortly after its parent company, ZeniMax, was acquired by Microsoft for $7.5 billion in 2021.

title: Alan Wake 2 Preloading Date And File Sizes Revealed
description:
Alan Wake 2 launches on October 27, but ahead of that, players can preload the much-anticipated sequel so they can get started the second it unlocks. Developer Remedy Entertainment has now confirmed when preloading begins (on console at least) and how much space the game will take up on your storage device.

Preloading begins 48 hours prior to launch on Xbox and PlayStation, which means players can start preloading on October 24 at 9 PM PT / 12 AM ET / 7 AM GMT. You can see a breakdown of preloading start times below.

Remedy did not say anything about preloading on PC. The game is exclusive to the Epic Games Store at launch, which is no surprise given that Epic funded the development of Alan Wake 2.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Here Are Four New Cards From Magic: The Gathering's Jurassic Park Crossover
description:
Mixed in with Magic: The Gathering's newest set--The Mesoamerican-themed Lost Caverns Of Ixalan, which launches November 17--are a selection of cards celebrating Jurassic Park's 30th anniversary. The set-within-a-set will feature 26 cards themed around the entire Jurassic Park saga, with familiar faces mixed in with iconic scenes from each of the movies.

We've received four exclusive previews--two of them double-sided--from this mini-set, which include a pivotal moment from the first movie, a swarm of tiny dinos, and two of the five basic lands.

First, let's take a look at those basic lands, as we have the double-side Forest and Plains:

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Diablo 4 Season 2 - How To Summon Endgame Bosses
description:
Diablo 4 Season 2 has introduced a number of new systems, including new endgame bosses that you can farm. These bosses can be found in special dungeons across the map, but you will need to first acquire some special items to summon the bosses. This feature was also added to the Eternal realm, so you don't need a seasonal character to farm these bosses. There are five in total: Echo of Varshan, Grigoire, Lord Zir, Beast in Ice, and Duriel. Here are the requirements to fight each boss and their potential drops.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Echo of Varshan

Echo of Varshan

title: Introducing The GameSpot Reviewcast
description:
Since it was founded in 1996, reviews have been a key pillar of GameSpot's coverage. The website has developed and maintained a reputation for delivering in-depth and thoughtful appraisals of games, with the goal of providing readers and viewers guidance on the games they should seek out and play, as well as analyzing how these titles may or may not impact the industry.

GameSpot has delivered thousands of written and video reviews, and now, we're expanding our efforts to include audio. We're proud to introduce the GameSpot Reviewcast, a podcast series that will bring our trusted reviews to you in podcast form. Each episode will feature a review of the latest releases based on the written review published on the site.

title: The Brand-New Resident Evil Board Game Is On Sale At Amazon
description:
Why wait for Capcom to make a remake of the remake of the first Resident Evil game, when you can do it yourself? That's kind of the pitch for Resident Evil: The Board Game, which will allow you to step into the tactical boots of Jill Valentine, Chris Redfield, Rebecca Chambers, or Barry Burton as you explore the Spencer Mansion and try to avoid becoming a Jill Sandwich in the process. The game launched earlier this month and is already on sale at Amazon for $86, down from its $100 list price.

See at Amazon

title: Let's Talk About That King Kong Game | The Kurt Locker
description: Skull Island: Rise of Kong caused a lot of commotion when it seemingly came out of nowhere, but Kurt thinks there's a bigger lesson to learn from this notorious game.

title: Get A Discounted Pair Of Gaming Glasses From Zenni Optical
description:
Gaming glasses are great for anyone who spends an extended amount of time in front of their computer. These unique accessories block blue light from your monitor, allowing you to play (or work) with less eye strain. Zenni Optical has long been a popular outlet for budget-friendly eyewear--and from now until October 29, you can cash in on a buy one, get one 20% off sale on a wide variety of glasses.

Tons of glasses are included in the event (including non-gamer glasses), and there are countless ways to customize each pair to fit your needs. You can even fit prescription lenses into the frames, allowing you to swap them out with your glasses while at your computer. If you need some help sifting through all the options, we've put together a list of the five coolest

title: Robert Kirkman Reacts To Invincible Season 1 Honest Trailer
description:
GameSpot sister site Screen Junkies's Honest Trailer videos have been an internet staple for over a decade, with hundreds of millions of views. On top of that, the reaction videos to various Honest Trailers have become a subgenre of their own. The latest to do a reaction is none other than Invincible co-creator Robert Kirkman as he reacts to the Honest Trailer of the first season of Prime Video's adaptation of his comic, Invincible.

The original Honest Trailer for Invincible dropped over two years ago when Season 1 was just premiering, but now Kirkman has taken a look at it and explained a few things behind the scenes and if he agrees that Jeff Bezos is similar to Lex Luthor. You can check out the full video below.

"We're doing this a little bit after this Honest Trailer came out because there was a massive gap between Invincible [Season 1 and 2]--so let's go on and address that," Kirkman

title: Metal Gear Solid Cologne Is Real, In Case You Want To Smell Like Tactical Espionage Action
description:
At long last, cloned soldiers of legendary war heroes now have the option of a themed cologne that they can apply in hopefully small doses before they get ejected from a submarine and into the freezing cold waters of the Bering Sea. Numskull Designs has officially unveiled its Metal Gear Solid cologne, possibly the best fragrance that you can use before you fight your twisted brother on top of a broken bipedal nuclear weapons platform after he's done monologuing. For the gamer who has run out of Xbox, Halo, and Destiny products, this might be the next best thing.

"Experience the thrilling world of espionage and secret operations of th

title: Bethesda Announced Elder Scrolls 6 So Early Because Fans Came With Pitchforks, Bruce Nesmith Says
description:
Bethesda announced The Elder Scrolls 6 back in 2018, and the game is still a long time off. According to Bethesda veteran Bruce Nesmith, who has since left the company, director Todd Howard only agreed to announce the game so early because fans were coming with "pitchforks and torches" inquiring about the game. Howard has subsequently questioned whether or not he made the right decision in announcing the game so early.

"You have to remember, the company took years of hits for not talking about The Elder Scrolls 6. I mean years of hits. Because Todd's opinion, one which I share by the way, is that the video game industry has short memories. Those companies that start touting their games years ahead of time? Actually, they screw themselves," Nesmith told MinnMax. "The best time to start talking about it is six months before release."

For Fallout 4, Bethesda announced the game in June 2015 and launched the

title: Wildly Popular Suika Game Now Has English Support On Switch eShop
description:
Developer Aladdin X has added English language support for Suika Game after it gained popularity among livestreamers. It's also known as "Watermelon Game" and the developer added a Halloween theme to commemorate the English release.

Suika Game plays similarly to Sega's Puyo Puyo Tetris, in which you have to line up matching fruits to make them disappear before the basket overflows. The aspect that separates Suika Game apart from its contemporaries is that the melons have different sizes and instead of blocks, the melons' circular shape allows them to roll around in the basket.

It was the Japanese eShop's best-selling game in September 2023 due to its viral popularity among livestreamers, especially v-tubers. The game initially didn't support English language support, but it now does.

title: Mission: Impossible Dead Reckoning 2 Gets Pushed Back A Year, Loses Its Title
description:
Not only will the subtitle change, but the release date is moving too for Mission: Impossible 8. The movie--previously known as Dead Reckoning Part 2--has been delayed almost an entire year to May 23, 2025.

The Hollywood Reporter adds that a new title for Mission: Impossible 8 is on the way in the future as well. Previously, Dead Reckoning 2 was slated to premiere June 28, 2024. However, production on the Tom Cruise-starring vehicle was paused to promote Dead Reckoning throughout the summer. Then, the Hollywood actors strike hit in July and still hasn't ended. The next adventure for Ethan Hunt probably isn't the only big blockbuster that will move out of 2024, either, according to The H

title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Director Teases "Big Surprise" For That One Heart-Breaking Scene
description:
In a new interview, Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth director Naoki Hamaguchi has hinted at a big surprise at the end of the game, one that puts a new spin on the original JRPG's iconic and tragic plot twist. For anyone who didn't play the original Final Fantasy 7, consider this your final spoiler warning. For longtime Final Fantasy 7 fans who began sweating when it was confirmed that Rebirth will end at the location of the Forgotten Capital, now is a good time to put some antiperspirant on before you read further about that scene.

Back in the original Final Fantasy 7, the death of Aerith at the hands--and incredibly long sword--of Sephiroth is still one of the defining moments of that game. At that point in the game, Aerith had become a key part of your party and was fully fleshed out as a character, allowing her death to have the maximum emotional impact on players.

Speaking to Indonesian gaming website

title: PlayStation x UEFA Champions League Extraordinary Drama Trailer
description: Ellie and Joel, from The Last of Us, race down the tunnel to deliver the match ball in time for kick off. Astro boosts his way to the center circle to collect the referee’s coin toss. God of War’s Kratos and Atreus are leading fans with a mighty blow of the Gjallarhorn. Spider-Men Peter Parker & Miles Morales from Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 come to the rescue in Marvel’s New York, saving a jumbotron during a match’s decisive moment.

title: Trepang2 Console Launch Non-Violent Trailer
description: Take control of a genetically enhanced super soldier with devastating abilities and uncover a malign conspiracy!

title: Daniel Radcliffe Discusses Comparisons To Elijah Wood: "Conceptually, We Are The Same"
description:
Actors Daniel Radcliffe and Elijah Wood are often compared, and now Radcliffe has spoken about this phenomenon and how he feels about it. Speaking to Vanity Fair, Radcliffe said he thinks himself and Wood share some similarities, but anyone who saw them standing next to each other might not get them confused.

"I think that me and Elijah Wood, the idea of us is the same--we are both short, pale, brown-haired actors with blues eyes. But we don't actually look that alike when we're next to each other," he said. "But conceptually, we are the same."

Radcliffe (34) went on to say that he thinks it's funny when people mistake him for Wood (42). The animated GIF below shows just how similar the two can be in appearance with the right editing.

Continue Readin

title: Alan Wake 2 NVIDIA DLSS 3.5 and Full Ray Tracing Technology Overview
description: Alan Wake 2 releases on October 27th with jaw-dropping fully ray-traced graphics, enhanced and accelerated by DLSS 3.5 with Ray Reconstruction, and the best responsiveness with NVIDIA Reflex. Experience the world of Alan Wake 2 in this video captured with a GeForce RTX 4090 GPU in 4K. Performance based on a pre-release version of the game.

title: You Can Get An Official Xbox Wireless Controller For Only $37 Right Now
Disney Adding A Haunted Mansion Bar To New Cruise Ship
description:
As Halloween draws near, Disney Cruise Line revealed Tuesday an all-new bar inspired by the iconic Disney Parks attraction, The Haunted Mansion, aptly titled The Haunted Mansion Parlor. Guests will soon be able to sip spirited craft cocktails among 999 happy haunts for the first time starting in December 2024 on the company's newest vessel, the Disney Treasure.

The one-of-a-kind experience will have guests in the center of the next chapter of the Haunted Mansion, focused on the story of an optimistic captain who entered the ghostly realm after a disastrous dinner with his beloved fiancé. The story also features a musical arrangement inspired by the attraction's original score and adapted by composer Shruti Kumar (AMC's Interview with The Vampire series). Walt Disney Imagineering will set the stage for the series of illusions and phantoms that immerse guests into more of the mysterious lore of the Haunted Mansion.

title: Get Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection At A Discount On Launch Day
description:
Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection is finally here, giving fans easy access to some of the best stealth games ever made. Volume 1 includes seven titles plus a bunch of bonus content--such as graphic novels and digital screenplay books--making it a notable collection for long-time fans and newcomers. And despite launching today, October 24, the collection is already discounted for PC to just $46.79 at Green Man Gaming.

See at Green Man Gaming

Green Man Gaming is selling the Steam version of the Master Collection, so you shouldn't have any problem adding it to your library. U

title: Warhammer Age of Sigmar Realms of Ruin Map Editor Trailer
description: Meet Xavier Henry, Art Director for Realms of Ruin as he takes us through an overview of the Map Editor, available for all at launch on November 17, 2023.

title: Star Wars™: Dark Forces Remaster - Reveal Trailer
description: We’re excited to announce Star Wars™: Dark Forces Remaster! Created in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games and fully remastered through our KEX engine, Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster supports up to 4K at 120FPS and features advanced 3D rendering, modern gamepad support, trophies and achievements, and more! Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster is coming soon to PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

title: The Lord of the Rings Return to Moria Launch Trailer
description: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria, the only survival crafting game set in the Fourth Age of Middle-earth, the iconic fantasy world created by J.R.R. Tolkien. Available now on PC via the Epic Games Store.

title: Xbox Elite Series 2 Core Controller Is Only $85 At Walmart
10 Years Later, Dual Destinies Remains Ace Attorney's Own The Rise Of Skywalker
description:
Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Dual Destinies is celebrating its 10-year anniversary today, October 24, 2023. Below, we reexamine the possibilities and shortcomings of its attempt to soft-reboot the Ace Attorney story.

Ruins signify a collapse. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Dual Destinies begins with the most heavy-handed representation of it, portraying an explosion inside a courtroom. This imagery is meant to echo the narrative breaking point that the law is going through. Yet, for a brief moment, it stands as a promising clean slate--it leads the player to believe Dual Destinies is rising from the ashes of a disruptive predecessor, determined to continue strengthening a new vision for the series. It's unfortunate, then, that the promise of reforming a decaying law system and passing the mantle to a different generation is never fulfilled.

title: Dune Ornithopter Lego Set Is Up For Preorder, Includes 8 Minifigures
description:
Over the years, Lego has gone from Gotham to Hogwarts for its licensed sets, but at long last, Arrakis is in the spotlight. A planet where the spice must always flow, you can celebrate the next chapter in the Dune saga with a highly detailed replica of the Atreides Royal Ornithopter. Preorders are now live for the $165 Lego Dune set, which will be released on February 1, 2024.

  • Dune Atreides Royal Ornithopter (Amazon) -- $165
  • Dune Atreides Royal Ornithopter (Lego Store) -- $165

This particular set is aimed at adults and has 1,369 pieces that can be used to build the signature vehicle of House Atreides, which rece

title: Dreams And LittleBigPlanet Developer Media Molecule Reportedly Suffers Layoffs
description:
Another notable video game studio has reportedly been hit with layoffs. This time, there is word that Dreams developer Media Molecule has slashed around 20 jobs at the company.

According to GLHF, sources relayed to them that Media Molecule is cutting down the British company''s size from 135 people to 115. Employees at the LittleBigPlanet and Tearaway developer--which sits under the PlayStation Studios umbrella--were reportedly notified today about the layoffs.

This comes over a month after Media Molecule ended live support for Dreams. However, players can still make and share their creations with the PS4 exclusive. The developer has shifted resources to a new, unannounced project.

title: Nintendo Switch OLED On Sale For $60 Off, But You Should Hurry
Is Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Coming To Game Pass?
description:
Microsoft recently completed its blockbuster $68.7 billion deal to acquire Activision Blizzard as part of the biggest buyout ever in video games. Microsoft has said it expects to bring Activision Blizzard games to Game Pass, but will Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III come to the subscription service?

Here's everything we know about the situation and what to expect before the game launches on November 10.

Modern Warfare 3 on Game Pass? Not at launch

Microsoft has said it will eventually bring Activision Blizzard games to Game Pass--and of course it would, considering how it will help grow the subscription service. But no one should expect to play Modern Warfare III on Game Pass this year. Prior to the deal closing, Activision told fans

title: Star Wars Dark Forces Remaster Launches Exactly 29 Years After The Original
description:
A remaster of a classic adventure from the Star Wars vault previously announced this summer now has a release date that will sound familiar to those who played the original release. Nightdive Studios and Lucasfilm have announced that Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster will launch February 28, which is 29 years to the day since its original release in 1995.

Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster stars Kyle Katarn, a mercenary who joins the Rebel Alliance's covert ops team, as he takes on the Empire and their secret Dark Trooper project. The game is notable for being the first-ever first-person-shooter in Star Wars history.

The new remaster will support up to 4K resolutions and 120FPS on PC and all consoles except Nintendo Switch. The game will offer modern controller features like rumble and motion controls, as well as trophy and achievement support on PlayStation, Xbox, and Steam.

title: Daniel Radcliffe Denies Wolverine Rumors, Explains Why He Got Buff
description:
A promo for the new season of Miracle Workers showed star Daniel Radcliffe looking extremely shredded. This prompted unfounded speculation that he might have gotten buff not just for that show, but also to play Wolverine in an upcoming project. This is not the case, though.

Radcliffe himself told Vanity Fair in a lie detector interview that he did not start the rumor that he might play Wolverine. "I got buff because I am obsessive," the actor said, adding that his parents are "insane fitness people" and this was passed on to him.

"No Wolverine. Flattered, but no," he said (via Entertainment Weekly). You can watch the entire lie detector video below.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: League Of Legends Has A Boy Band Now
description:
Riot Games has just debuted a new music group under its Riot Games Music label -- this time taking the form of a boy band. Called Heartsteel, the group is made up of League of Legends characters Ezreal, Kayn, Aphelios, Yone, K'Sante, and Sett, and its first single Paranoia released today.

The group's music comes from a collaboration with a number of real-life international artists: Baekhyun of K-pop group EXO and SuperM provides the voice for Ezreal, a vocalist. Los Angeles rapper Cal Scruby lends his voice to Kayn, who is both a rapper and instrumentalist. Taiwanese-American R&B and Mandopop artist ØZI is the voice for Sett, who is the group's co-leader and a rapper, while American multi-talented artist Tobi Lou voices other co-leader and vocalist K'Sante. The other non-vocalist members of the group include producer Yone and Aphelios who is an instrumentalist and songwriter.

Riot

title: Ghostrunner 2 Review Roundup
description:
The sequel to 2020's dystopian cyberpunk parkour platformer Ghostrunner is almost here, and critics have started to reveal their thoughts on Ghostrunner 2.

Reviews for the sequel look generally positive, with fans of the original game saying Ghostrunner 2 expands on and improves everything that made the original great, including vivid visuals, an exciting soundtrack, and amazing parkour-style traversal. Those who didn't enjoy the game as much have criticized its pacing, saying the game felt far longer than it needed to be, with some sections feeling like unnecessary filler.

The game has an aggregated score of 80 on Metacritic for both PS5 and PC versions, and a slightly lower score of 78 on Xbox Series X|S.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
